name: Halls High
description: Halls High is a coming of age story that explores how to overcome the biggest obstacle one can face while growing up, yourself. The game revolves around teaching the player the importance of maturity and education. It is designed to inform the player that growing up. is something that is natural and a necessary occurrence. While the player goes through the level, they'll experience history, specifically that of the mid-1800s, that will help them understand the characters story and mature.
